description.plain: Daryl “Kent” Jones is a Tallahase-bred singer, rapper and record producer who signed to DJ Khaled’s We The Best record label in 2015. Best known for the single “Don’t Mind”. Works closely with Cool & Dre, Illa and other Miami based artists.

body.plain: Daryl “Kent” Jones is a Tallahase-bred singer, rapper and record producer who signed to DJ Khaled’s We The Best record label in 2015. Best known for the single “Don’t Mind”. Works closely with Cool & Dre, Illa and other Miami based artists.

songs.title: Don’t Mind

description.plain:
DJ Khaled protégé Kent Jones released “Don’t Mind” in the summer of 2015 as part of his Tours mixtape.

The Florida-native started out as a producer. He has worked with Fat Joe and Cool & Dre before signing with Khaled’s We The Best label in 2014.

Jones is a trained jazz pianist and learned music theory and composition at school, as he told an interviewer in early 2016:

I’m very musically inclined. I have perfect pitch. I was gonna go to college to become a jazz professor.

The track interpolates some of the lyrics and melody from legendary R&B/soul singer Barry White’s 1994 hit “Practice What You Preach.” It also uses greetings in English, French, Japanese, Spanish, and Haitian Creole, but Jones says he doesn’t speak any language other than English.

songs.embed_content: Read “Don't Mind” by Kent Jones on Genius

body.plain:
DJ Khaled protégé Kent Jones released “Don’t Mind” in the summer of 2015 as part of his Tours mixtape.

The Florida-native started out as a producer. He has worked with Fat Joe and Cool & Dre before signing with Khaled’s We The Best label in 2014.

Jones is a trained jazz pianist and learned music theory and composition at school, as he told an interviewer in early 2016:

I’m very musically inclined. I have perfect pitch. I was gonna go to college to become a jazz professor.

The track interpolates some of the lyrics and melody from legendary R&B/soul singer Barry White’s 1994 hit “Practice What You Preach.” It also uses greetings in English, French, Japanese, Spanish, and Haitian Creole, but Jones says he doesn’t speak any language other than English.

songs.title: Sit Down
songs.title_with_featured: Sit Down (Ft. E-40, Lil Dicky & Ty Dolla $ign)

description.plain:
Kent Jones' single “Sit Down” was released on February 21, 2017 and features Lil Dicky, Ty Dolla $ign, and E-40.

This song is from the We The Best Music artist’s mixtape Too Much Too Soon, which was released on September 16, 2016.

The remix to Kent Jones' smash summer hit “Don’t Mind” features Pitbull and Lil Wayne.

You can listen to the track here.

You can listen to the track here.

Kent Jones

Codeine in my urine so I'm snoring and ignoring
When she–

No matter where I go, you know I love 'em all

No matter where I go

[Verse 3: Kent Jones]
Lord have mercy, I can't help but keep it G
Grab your girls if you with them
If you ain't take the keys and go and get them
While you at it get your mom so I can thank her for your courage
'Cause you got them family genes and I love the way you fit 'em
She don't wanna leave, why? 'Cause I'm a true religion
Tell your friend to be my guest, and if she smart she know the rest
I had way too much Belaire, and I'm quiet sure you can tell it
To be real I forgot your name, so I'm askin' how you spell it, you keep

It's We The Best epidemic, epic! (This the remix babe, yeah)
